name: Hari Prasath
paragraph: Myself a Cloud wrangler, DevOps tinkerer, and code whisperer on a mission to automate everything. Equipped with solid knowledge of cloud platforms, CI/CD pipelines, and automation tools. Passionate about innovation, collaboration, and ensuring my scripts are as strong as my squats. Always learning, always improving, because in tech (and in the gym), stagnation is not an option!
